name: Namrata
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the happiness always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: I Know You thinking about Whats going on!! wait na...
text2:
On your special day, well you've got everyday special so move on from this. 
  May the stars shine brightly to guide you towards your dreams.
text3:
May the bundle of joy and laughter fill your heart, 
May the moonshine of happiness crown your head,
You are a shining light in this world
text4:
With a heart as pure as the morning dew
And a spirit as free as the breeze. 
May your day as beautiful and radiant as you are.
